Description: Doll's shirt. Very small shirt of white cotton, sewing in dark blue thread. Body a single piece of cloth folded on the shoulders, hole cut for the head. Sleeves very long and flaring towards the ends, each of one piece folded along the top. Two very simple lines of embroidery down the front - couching? centre front, running stitch on left side.
Findspot: Excavated/Findspot: Qasr Ibrim (Nubia), pit 82/26 unit B52
Acquisition name: Division of Finds: Egyptian Antiquities Organisation
